name: MovingFoward
description:
What can stop a person's momentum? What if these deterrents can manifest itself and affects those in your circle. Explore, find the objects in the school and destroy what keep our momentum going while being on time for class or your friends will die.

Explore that vastness of Hostos Community college with your mobile device in an Augmented reality visual novel style experience and unlock the story of those how need to Move forward!
